input_text:
Job Title: Account Relationship Manager DFW

Location: Irving, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Other, Sales

Description:
Vision Statement: At XL Pro Staffing & Consulting, our mission is to redefine success by matching exceptional talent with outstanding opportunities. We are dedicated to providing personalized, transparent, and innovative staffing solutions that not only meet the needs of our clients but also elevate the professional journey of every individual we serve. Join us in shaping the future of work, where your skills are recognized, your aspirations are valued, and your career thrives. Explore limitless possibilities with XL Pro Staffing & Consultingâ€“ where talent meets opportunity, and success becomes a shared journey. #EmpoweringCareers #TalentConnection #CareerSuccess.
XL Pro Staffing and Consulting is now hiring Account Relationship Managers for the following areas: Irving, and Mesquite.
Job Summary:We are seeking motivated and experienced Account Relationship Managers to join our dynamic team. As an Account Relationship Manager, you will play a crucial role in driving business growth by nurturing existing client accounts, identifying new business opportunities, and ensuring exceptional service delivery. The ideal candidate will have a proven track record of success in staffing sales, excellent communication skills, and the ability to work in a fast-paced, results-driven environment. We are a dynamic staffing company with multiple offices all over DFW and are always seeking experienced talent to join our team!
Key Responsibilities:-Prospect for and develop new business relationships with potential clients.-Build and maintain strong relationships with existing clients to ensure their satisfaction and repeat business.-Identify and evaluate the potential staffing needs of clients and match their requirements with our available resources.-Prepare and deliver presentations and proposals to potential clients.-Negotiate contract terms and pricing with clients to achieve favorable outcomes for both parties.-Collaborate with the internal team to ensure the effective delivery of services to clients.-Attend networking events and other industry events to develop new business leads.-Meet and exceed weekly, monthly, and annual sales targets.
Qualifications:-Proven track record of success in staffing sales with a minimum of 3-5 years of experience.-Excellent communication, negotiation, and interpersonal skills.-Ability to work independently and as part of a team.-Strong organizational and time management skills.-Ability to manage multiple tasks and prioritize effectively.-Familiarity with CRM software and Microsoft Office.-A deep understanding of the staffing industry and current market trends.-A consultative selling approach and the ability to build strong relationships with clients.-Strong presentation and proposal writing skills.-A results-driven mindset with a passion for exceeding sales targets.-A valid driver's license and the ability to travel as needed to meet with clients and attend industry events.
Benefits:-401K-Strong base salary plus a lucrative uncapped commission.-Company benefits.-Paid work-related expenses.
If you or someone you know is interested in joining our dynamic team and making a real impact, please send your resumes to chelsea@xlproconsulting.com
To keep up with job updates, news, and events follow us on our social media: LinkedInFacebookTwitterInstagram

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.summary: Join XL Pro Staffing & Consulting, a dynamic staffing company, as an Account Relationship Manager in Irving, TX.
job_responsibilities: Developing and maintaining strong client relationships
Preparing and delivering presentations and proposals

other.content: Seeking motivated and experienced Account Relationship Managers to drive business growth by nurturing client accounts, identifying new business opportunities, and ensuring exceptional service delivery.

Proven track record in staffing sales, excellent communication skills, ability to work independently and in teams, strong organizational skills, ability to manage multiple tasks, familiarity with CRM software and Microsoft Office, understanding of the staffing industry, consultative selling approach, strong presentation and proposal writing skills, results-driven mindset, passion for sales targets.
401K, strong base salary plus uncapped commission, company benefits, paid work-related expenses.
